subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In his first start since a dreadful performance last week, Olivier Pérez allowed one run while pitching six and two-thirds innings of the Mets’ 2-1 exhibition victory against the Baltimore Orioles.
snippet: In his first start since a dreadful performance last week, Olivier Pérez allowed one run while pitching six and two-thirds innings of the Mets’ 2-1 exhibition victory against the Baltimore Orioles.
